results.title: Beneficial role of simvastatin in experimental autoimmune myositis.
results.text_hl: Muscle strength dropped significantly after immunization. Immunized @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ 20 mg/kg treated group had significantly higher muscle strength versus non-treated @<m>DISEASE_Myositis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009220 @@@myositis@@@ @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@ and versus other @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ doses.

citations.NLM: Maalouly G, Hajal J, Saliba Y, Rached G, Layoun H, Smayra V, Sleilaty G, Irani C, Fares N. Beneficial role of simvastatin in experimental autoimmune myositis. Int Immunopharmacol. 2020 Feb;79():106051. PMID: 31863923

results.title: Efficacy and safety of pravastatin vs simvastatin after cardiac transplantation.
results.text_hl: @CHEMICAL_Pravastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017035 @@@Pravastatin@@@ use was however free from the high rates of @DISEASE_Rhabdomyolysis @DISEASE_MESH:D012206 @@@rhabdomyolysis@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Myositis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009220 @@@myositis@@@ seen with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ use.
